about_the_game:
∆ is an atmospheric first-person exploration game that takes you on a journey to the Beyond - a time/space singularity that can only be accessed through a hidden door inside a dream.

[Features]

  • Modern graphics and immersive sound design, powered by Unreal Engine 5.
  • Combines exploration, mind-bending puzzle and platforming elements.
  • A dreamy, ominous atmosphere.
  • Horror elements without relying on jump scares.
  • Approximately 2-3 hours of playtime.

[Story]

Declassified documents from a secret research project reveal that the dream realm is physical in nature and consists of multiple layers.
While regular and lucid dreams occur near the surface, deeper layers constitute a shared reality and can only be accessed by specially trained agents and mystics or by the means of deep space travel.
It is hypothesized that at the bottom of the labyrinth lies a passage to the Beyond - a time/space singularity transcendental to human understanding.
